price: 29. (Er zal gezegd worden tegen de ongelovigen:) "Vertrek jullie naar datgene wat jullie plachten te ontkennen!”
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
